author: Reuters Editorial
title: GKN Recommends Shareholders Accept Melrose Offer
text:
March 29 (Reuters) - GKN Plc:
* ‍RECOMMENDATION TO ACCEPT OFFER​ * ‍BOARD RECOGNISES THAT, IN EVENT THAT OFFER IS DECLARED WHOLLY UNCONDITIONAL, MELROSE WOULD ACQUIRE CONTROL OF GKN​
* NOW RECOMMENDS THAT SHAREHOLDERS ACCEPT OFFER, AS GKN DIRECTORS INTEND TO DO IN RESPECT OF THEIR OWN BENEFICIAL HOLDINGS​
* ‍GLEACHER SHACKLOCK AND UBS LIMITED ARE PROVIDING INDEPENDENT FINANCIAL ADVICE TO BOARD FOR PURPOSES OF RULE 3 OF CITY CODE​
* ‍NOW INTENDS TO WORK WITH MELROSE TO ENSURE SUCCESS OF ENLARGED COMPANY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
